value.string:
selection_domain
 selection_report
 node_uid
 where_expression
 omit_input
 omit_output
 resource_uid:list
 from_date
 to_date
 at_date
 simulation_state:list
 section_category
 payment_uid
 no_payment_uid
 mirror_section_uid
 no_mirror_section_uid

<dtml-call "log('Account_zGetAccountingTransactionList is deprecated, use Inventory API instead')>
 <dtml-if node_uid>
 SELECT
 DISTINCT transaction.uid, transaction.path,
 transaction_line.path as current_transaction_line_path,
 transaction.title as transaction_title,
 mirror_section.title AS third_party,
 IF(stock.total_price > 0, stock.total_price, 0.0) AS debit,
 IF(stock.total_price < 0, - stock.total_price, 0.0) AS credit,
 stock.date AS date,
 IF(stock.section_uid = delivery.source_section_uid,
 transaction.source_reference,
 transaction.destination_reference) AS specific_reference,
 stock.total_price AS balance,
 stock.payment_uid AS payment_uid
 FROM
 catalog,
 catalog AS transaction_line,
 catalog AS transaction,
 delivery,
 catalog AS section_c,
 catalog AS section_bc,
 category AS section_membership,
 catalog AS section,
 <dtml-if selection_domain><dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLJoinExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_domain)">, </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report><dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLJoinExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_report)">, </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if where_expression>, category </dtml-if>
 stock
 LEFT JOIN catalog AS mirror_section
 ON mirror_section.uid = stock.mirror_section_uid
 AND stock.node_uid = <dtml-var node_uid>
 
 WHERE stock.node_uid = <dtml-var node_uid>
 AND delivery.uid = transaction.uid
 AND transaction_line.uid = stock.uid
 AND transaction_line.portal_type <> 'Simulation Movement'
 AND transaction_line.parent_uid = transaction.uid
 AND catalog.uid = stock.section_uid
 <dtml-if resource_uid>
 AND (
 <dtml-in resource_uid>
 stock.resource_uid = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="int">
 <dtml-unless sequence-end> OR </dtml-unless>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if from_date>
 AND stock.date >= <dtml-sqlvar from_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if at_date>
 AND stock.date <= <dtml-sqlvar at_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if to_date>
 AND stock.date < <dtml-sqlvar to_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_input>
 AND stock.total_price < 0
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_output>
 AND stock.total_price > 0
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if payment_uid>
 AND stock.payment_uid = <dtml-sqlvar payment_uid type="int">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if no_payment_uid>
 AND stock.payment_uid IS NULL
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if mirror_section_uid>
 AND stock.mirror_section_uid = <dtml-sqlvar mirror_section_uid type="int">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if no_mirror_section_uid>
 AND stock.mirror_section_uid IS NULL
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if simulation_state>
 AND (
 <dtml-in simulation_state>
 transaction.simulation_state = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="string">
 <dtml-if sequence-end><dtml-else> OR </dtml-if>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 <dtml-else>
 AND transaction.simulation_state != 'cancelled'
 AND transaction.simulation_state != 'draft' 
 </dtml-if>
 AND section.uid = stock.section_uid
 <dtml-if section_category>
 AND section_c.relative_url = <dtml-sqlvar
 section_category type="string">
 </dtml-if>
 AND section_membership.category_uid = section_c.uid
 AND section_membership.base_category_uid = section_bc.uid
 AND section_membership.uid = section.uid
 AND section.portal_type = 'Organisation'
 <dtml-if where_expression>
 AND catalog.uid = category.uid
 AND <dtml-var where_expression>
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_domain>
 AND <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_domain)">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report>
 AND <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_report, strict_membership=1)">
 </dtml-if>
 ORDER BY
 stock.date, transaction_line.uid
 </dtml-if>

<dtml-call "log('Account_zGetAccountingTransactionList is deprecated, use Inventory API instead')>
 <dtml-if node_uid>
 SELECT
 DISTINCT transaction.uid, transaction.path,
 transaction_line.path as current_transaction_line_path,
 transaction.title as transaction_title,
 mirror_section.title AS third_party,
 IF(stock.total_price > 0, stock.total_price, 0.0) AS debit,
 IF(stock.total_price < 0, - stock.total_price, 0.0) AS credit,
 stock.date AS date,
 IF(stock.section_uid = delivery.source_section_uid,
 transaction.source_reference,
 transaction.destination_reference) AS specific_reference,
 stock.total_price AS balance,
 stock.payment_uid AS payment_uid
 FROM
 catalog,
 catalog AS transaction_line,
 catalog AS transaction,
 delivery,
 catalog AS section_c,
 catalog AS section_bc,
 category AS section_membership,
 catalog AS section,
 <dtml-if selection_domain><dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLJoinExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_domain)">, </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report><dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLJoinExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_report)">, </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if where_expression>, category </dtml-if>
 stock
 LEFT JOIN catalog AS mirror_section
 ON mirror_section.uid = stock.mirror_section_uid
 AND stock.node_uid = <dtml-var node_uid>
 
 WHERE stock.node_uid = <dtml-var node_uid>
 AND delivery.uid = transaction.uid
 AND transaction_line.uid = stock.uid
 AND transaction_line.portal_type <> 'Simulation Movement'
 AND transaction_line.parent_uid = transaction.uid
 AND catalog.uid = stock.section_uid
 <dtml-if resource_uid>
 AND (
 <dtml-in resource_uid>
 stock.resource_uid = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="int">
 <dtml-unless sequence-end> OR </dtml-unless>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if from_date>
 AND stock.date >= <dtml-sqlvar from_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if at_date>
 AND stock.date <= <dtml-sqlvar at_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if to_date>
 AND stock.date < <dtml-sqlvar to_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_input>
 AND stock.total_price < 0
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_output>
 AND stock.total_price > 0
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if payment_uid>
 AND stock.payment_uid = <dtml-sqlvar payment_uid type="int">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if no_payment_uid>
 AND stock.payment_uid IS NULL
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if mirror_section_uid>
 AND stock.mirror_section_uid = <dtml-sqlvar mirror_section_uid type="int">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if no_mirror_section_uid>
 AND stock.mirror_section_uid IS NULL
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if simulation_state>
 AND (
 <dtml-in simulation_state>
 transaction.simulation_state = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="string">
 <dtml-if sequence-end><dtml-else> OR </dtml-if>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 <dtml-else>
 AND transaction.simulation_state != 'cancelled'
 AND transaction.simulation_state != 'draft' 
 </dtml-if>
 AND section.uid = stock.section_uid
 <dtml-if section_category>
 AND section_c.relative_url = <dtml-sqlvar
 section_category type="string">
 </dtml-if>
 AND section_membership.category_uid = section_c.uid
 AND section_membership.base_category_uid = section_bc.uid
 AND section_membership.uid = section.uid
 AND section.portal_type = 'Organisation'
 <dtml-if where_expression>
 AND catalog.uid = category.uid
 AND <dtml-var where_expression>
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_domain>
 AND <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_domain)">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report>
 AND <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_report, strict_membership=1)">
 </dtml-if>
 ORDER BY
 stock.date, transaction_line.uid
 </dtml-if>
